data.text:
Hallen Am Borsigturm, Berlin, Germany

Latitude and longitude coordinates are: 52.584297, 13.286218.

Hallen Am Borsigturm is a large modern indoor shopping center in Tegel, a locality in the Berlin borough of Reinickendorf, Germany. It is located at Am Borsigturm 2 near Lake Tegel, in the northwestern part of the city. The mall is in a converted 19th-century factory, and houses plenty of stores and restaurants as well as a five-story office building, a movie theatre, a gym, and a bowling alley. The shopping center was opened on March 25, 1999. It is accessible by Borsigwerke Subway Station.
